CRAN statistics

2024-05-23

Source: vignettes/cran-statistics.Rmd
cran-statistics.Rmd

We currently have 3 Epiverse-TRACE packages on CRAN:

  • linelist
  • cfr
  • finalsize

In total, Epiverse-TRACE packages on CRAN have been downloaded 18422 times.

Below is a visualization of the breakdown of this grand total by package over time.

package 2022 2023 2024
finalsize 260 2881 1480
linelist 3712 4898 3504
cfr NA 364 1323
Total 3972 8143 6307
